title: Leading Croatian national team players at FIFA World Cup 2018 , by market value
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
There is a difference of 48.5 between the maximum Month Ivan Rakitic and minimum Month Dominik Livakovic.
min_summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
There is a difference of 48.5 between the maximum Month Ivan Rakitic and minimum Month Dominik Livakovic.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The difference of Market value in million euros between the highest and lowest Month is 48.5.
The Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros, followed by Ivan Perisic, and Mateo Kovacic. Down to the Month Dominik Livakovic which is the lowest.
The Market value in million euros has lowered over the past 23 Months.
Month Andrej Kramaric, and Marcelo Brozovic have a similar Market value in million euros that is 27.0.
The Month Ivan Rakitic has 3.16 times more Market value in million euros than average.
The Market value in million euros is 364.0 if we add up values of all Months.
